txt.en: 'For me? Why, yes, I suppose there is something you could do for me. My favourite walking stick was taken from me. Brutal thing. I was walking through the marshes south of here, when suddenly these marsh-striders appeared. Very rude chaps, wouldn't take no for an answer, and stripped me of my walking stick. I tried to tell them it was my favourite, but they weren't hearing it, for some reason.\n\n'I would very much appreciate it if you would have a word with them. May be more likely to listen to you. Anyway, I was walking near Zahûmakh when I was accosted. I expect the stick is still there, possibly in the possession of one of those boorish marsh-striders.'
Recover Usakâr's favourite walking stick from a marsh-strider in Zahûmakh
Recover Usakâr's favourite walking stick from a marsh-strider in Zahûmakh.

'Ah, there it is. Wherever did you find it? That's right, the marsh. I can tell from the smell. I think this just became my second favourite walking stick. Bit ripe, isn't it? Still, thank you for finding it.'
Recover Usakâr's favourite walking stick from a marsh-strider in Zahûmakh.
Usakâr's favourite walking stick was taken from him by a marsh-strider in Zahûmakh. Recover the walking stick from the boorish marsh-striders.
Recover Usakâr's favourite walking stick from a marsh-strider in Zahûmakh
You found Usakâr's favourite walking stick
Return to Usakâr near Dag Usakâra with the walking stick.
Return to Usakâr near Dag Usakâra with the walking stick
